member.name: P:HttpWebAdapters.IHttpWebRequest.AllowAutoRedirect
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the request should follow redirection responses.
member.returns: true if the request should automatically follow redirection responses from the Internet resource; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:HttpWebAdapters.IHttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer the data sent to the Internet resource.
member.returns: true to enable buffering of the data sent to the Internet resource; false to disable buffering. The default is true.

member.name: P:HttpWebAdapters.IHttpWebRequest.HaveResponse
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether a response has been received from an Internet resource.
member.returns: true if a response has been received; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HttpWebAdapters.IHttpWebRequest.KeepAlive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to make a persistent connection to the Internet resource.
member.returns: true if the request to the Internet resource should contain a Connection HTTP header with the value Keep-alive; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:HttpWebAdapters.IHttpWebRequest.Pipelined
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to pipeline the request to the Internet resource.
member.returns: true if the request should be pipelined; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:HttpWebAdapters.IHttpWebRequest.PreAuthenticate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to send an authenticate header with the request.
member.returns: true to send a WWW-authenticate HTTP header with requests after authentication has taken place; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:HttpWebAdapters.IHttpWebRequest.UnsafeAuthenticatedConnectionSharing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to allow high-speed NTLM-authenticated connection sharing.
member.returns: true to keep the authenticated connection open; otherwise, false.
